name: Ladybug Ball - Github Game Off 2021
description:
Touch/click and hold anywhere to aim and relase to shoot the Ladybug Ball. Best experience on mobile browser! :)

There is a "Debug" button in the game to toggle the controls.

You can decide if the behavior is a bug or a feature and you can change or "debug" it. It is an intended pun for the Jam's topic :D

This is a game about a cute ladybug ball on an adventure to gather all the stars fallen on the planet.

Lush pixelart, tight touch or mouse controls and hilarious and challenging physics will test you in handcrafter puzzle platforming levels acompanied by pleasant sounds and relaxing music.


The game is participating in Github GameOff 2021 and its source code is fully available on Github here. Because this jam and Yandex Defold Game Jam overlapped in November there is also an alternative version of this game titled Gumobalka :)
